room.name: A Jungle Path
room.description: This path stretches away into the distance, hemmed in on both sides by the tall trees that are so common in this jungle.

action.name: Examine
action.message: This is a tall carved stone. It has lots of writing carved into it by unknown hands.

action.name: Examine
action.message: You gaze at the tree. The bark is old and rugged, with claw marks from small animals criss-crossing it.
action.sound: D:\sounds\CORE 2 Free Sampler\Swooshes\Swish\SWSH_Palm Frond Whoosh Fast Stereo 090_PSE_WPA_0Vcbe.wav

action.name: Travel back along the path
action.message: You walk back along the path.

action.name: Go through a small hole in the undergrowth
action.message: You work your way into the small hole.

room.name: A small hole in the ground.
room.description: You find yourself in a small hole burrowed into the undergrowth along the sides of the path. The walls are supported by gnarled routes, and the floor is covered with a light dusting of sand.
room.ambiance: D:\sounds\CORE 2 Free Sampler\Musical\Song & Phrase\MUSCSong_Alexion Full Mix_001_PSE_AMO_G4cHe.wav

action.name: Clamber back onto the jungle path.
action.message: You clamber out of the hole.

world.message: There is nothing you can do with this object.
There is no way out of this room.
